column1: All Peninsular Malaysia Candidates names are either derived from August and October 1974 government gazettes mentioned in the metadata. The Sarawak 1974 Candidate names are derived from Penyata Pilihan Raya Umum (Dewan Rakyat  dan Dewan Undangan Negeri), Tahun 1974, Suruhanjaya Pilihan Raya
New Straits Times, 26 August 1974 states Oran has additional PSRM candidate though no evidence found in government gazette
Oran PSRM candidate of Amin bin Ishak may have an alternate name called Bakar Arrifin
Perlis Candidates requiring more verification for sex category

Vote Value for PSRM candidate for Bukit Gantang is an estimate
